text: Marek Pittner (born 14 February 1997) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a defender for Komárno. ==Club career== ===FK Senica=== Pittner made his Fortuna Liga debut for Senica on 20 March 2015 in a match against Spartak Myjava.SENICA VS. title: Marek Pittner
